rows.label: tlk70000039_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Here in Iira, we revere the
might of the Divine Beasts.
It's essentially our religion.

rows.label: tlk70000039_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Though it's not like we
have much in the way of
special rituals or rules.

rows.label: tlk70000039_01_msg0003
rows.name:
We just believe in respecting the life
that surrounds us. Divine Beasts, humans,
Blades. We're all the same really.

rows.label: tlk70000039_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Every one of us is a gift to the world
we live in, and sometimes it can be
good to show our gratitude for that.
